blocks.heading: Run open-source LLMs on your own infra. Zero data egress.
blocks.description: Get a production-ready, OpenAI-compatible API for open-source models, running entirely inside your network. 100% private.

cards.heading: Run on Your Infrastructure
cards.description: Deploy to any VPC, private cloud, or bare-metal server. Guarantees zero data ever leaves your network, satisfying the strictest compliance and security requirements.
